name: iching-engine-sample
description: Enhanced I Ching decision engine with NLP, tracing, KPI signals, and configurable strategies (TypeScript)

scripts.test: tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join(__dirname,'test');const dst=path.join(__dirname,'dist','test');fs.rmSync(dst,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(dst,{recursive:true});for(const f of fs.readdirSync(src)){if(f.endsWith('.js'))fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,f),path.join(dst,f));}console.log('Copied test files to dist/test');" && node dist/test/run-tests.js
